1.name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
1.short_description: Soft cotton tee with a sharp, long-lasting print.
1.discription:
Elevate your everyday style with our Classic Cotton T-Shirt. Crafted from 100% premium, breathable cotton, it features a sharp, high-quality print that's built to last. Perfect for casual outings or layering, this tee offers unbeatable comfort and a versatile look. Available in sizes L & XL.

*Please Note: As per our policy, all sales are final. We do not accept returns or exchanges.*
